featuredPosts2.title: Greece Toll Roads Everything You Need to Know
featuredPosts2.excerpt: Toll roads in Greece There are two major toll roads in Greece that you need to be aware of. One of them goes from Athens to Thessaloniki and the other from Igoumenitsa to Alexandroupolis.
